taskDescription: Drag the words into the correct boxes
resetDropDescription: Are you sure you want to reset this drop zone?
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.
textField: Initially, published work on NMT was mostly conducted by *well-resourced* academic research groups in *North America and Europe* as cost, power and data requirements were an obstacle for *NMT development*. This has changed for two reasons. Research groups were struggling to compete in major European languages and they focused on under-resourced and *minority languages*. Moreover back-translating *monolingual data* allowed for the creation of ‘synthetic’ data, which led to a *quality improvement* for under-resourced language pairs.
